mapper.insert: insert into goods (goods_id, goods_kind, goods_type, price, stock_amount, create_time, last_update, admin_id) values (#{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsKind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stockAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{lastUpdate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{adminId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update goods set goods_kind = #{goodsKind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_type = #{goodsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=INTEGER}, stock_amount = #{stockAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, last_update = #{lastUpdate,jdbcType=DATE}, admin_id = #{adminId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select goods_id, goods_kind, goods_type, price, stock_amount, create_time, last_update, admin_id from goods where goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select goods_id, goods_kind, goods_type, price, stock_amount, create_time, last_update, admin_id from goods
